Posts.Content: I am writing on behalf of my wife who had a wide local excision a few weeks ago. Yesterday she noticed a small pale "blister" (maybe 3-5mm but very obvious) on the edge of her nipple where the incision was made. She wonders if anyone else has experienced something similar. We'll be going to the GP first thing Monday in any case but would appreciate any comments. She is also due to see the oncologist next week for her pre-radiotherapy assessment, and we are worried that the treatment might be adversely affected by this change. We are not looking for medical advice from the group, just trying to get things into perspective. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Post op complications

Posts.Content: Thank you for such a comprehensive reply. At the moment, it is not causing any pain, redness or irritation but she is being very careful with clothing etc. Thanks again!
Posts.Title: Post op complications

Posts.Content: Hello there Karen 234, Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. Best wishes.
Posts.Title: Post op complications

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for sharing your experience. My wife is really pleased with the help offered by so many  people in this amazing community.

Posts.Content: Thank you so much ... really helpful!
